content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Science Pack Production Facility (around position 8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest (position 5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter (position 6.5, 13.5) that moves items from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine-1 (position 8.5, 13.5) that produces automation science packs
- Burner inserter (position 10.5, 13.5) that moves products to output chest
- Output chest (position 11.5, 13.5) containing automation science packs
- Connected belt system for material transport

### Power Generation System (around position -4.5, 14.0)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position -3.5, 27.5) providing water
- Boiler (position -4.5, 16.0) converting water to steam
- Steam engine (position -4.5, 12.5) generating power
- Connected pipe system for water/steam transport
- Electricity network connecting various machines

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup (around position -28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -28.0, -61.0)
- Output chest (position -27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter (position -26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace (position -25.0, -59.0)
- Storage chest (position -22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates

### Secondary Mining Operations
- Coal mining setup with burner mining drill (position 41.0, -82.0) and chest (position 41.5, -80.5)
- Additional mining drill (position -18.0, -53.0) with associated storage and transport system

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Check if items exist in the target chest before attempting extraction
- Verify the correct chest position and contents before extraction operations

### Research-related errors
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research it again
- Verify research prerequisites and requirements before setting research

### Resource shortage errors
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Monitor and maintain proper material flow to assembling machines

### Fuel management issues
- Keep track of fuel levels in burner devices
- Ensure sufficient coal supply for all burner-based equipment
- Implement regular refueling cycles for mining drills and inserters

### Inventory management
- Verify inventory contents before attempting to insert items
- Maintain adequate stock of essential materials
